meanings.english_definition: (Latin) to hold in, restrain, check, hinder, prevent

examples.translation: (Latin) to restrain the force of the enemy
examples.english_translation: (English) to restrain the force of the enemy

usage_notes.explanation: 'Inhibere' is a Latin verb with the general meaning of holding something back or restraining it. It is often used in military contexts to describe holding back an enemy or checking an attack. It can also be used more generally to describe preventing something from happening.
